snippet: As the gridlock in Washington showed few signs of resolution, global stock indexes generally headed down.
abstract: Markets end lower as gridlock in Washington shows few signs of ending government shutdown.
lead_paragraph: As the gridlock in Washington showed few signs of resolution, global stock indexes generally headed down.

headline.main: Shares Fall as Congress Fails to Act on Budget
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall as Congress Fails to Act on Budget
